Data Centers

Request Quote

Green Data Center Services in India

Web Werks offers smart expansion options for your IT requirements without large upfront capital expenses. Our data center facilities are highly secure and built on redundant network located in India and the United States. We are one of the leading data center providers in India with built concept of N+1 redundancy in infrastructure, networks, cooling, power backup solutions and hardware.

Why deal with technical complexities, when Web Werks is offering advanced Data Center Solutions that aids all the technical needs of your business. Stock your mission-critical applications and data within our highly reliable, secure and redundant IT facility. We simply do not store your hardware, but ensure that it works exceptionally throughout.

Incredibly customizable and instantly provisioned colocation services, virtual private servers and dedicated hosting with nearly 100% uptime guarantee gives you freedom to choose the solution you want from the server you choose. You can add additional CPU, DISK and RAM. You can also select optional add-on solutions including 4 hour hardware replacement, customizable network, firewall, load balanced services, Engineers and backup in case of Disaster Recovery.

About Web Werks

Web Werks is one of the leading TIER III & TIER
IV Data Center service providers in India and in
the United States in business since 1996 with
five State-of-the-art Data Centers and
remarkable 24x7 Rapid Action Support and
99.995% Uptime Guarantee.
